name: Rainy Day
description:
By any chance...
do you have old memories that have been
folded in your heart?

Memories that are dazzlingly beautiful and poignantly heartbreaking are
colored in our hearts over a long period of time
and engraved in our hearts under the name of memories.

[Rainy Day] is
a story about those memories.





[Rainy Day] is a point-and-click storytelling game.
[Rainy Day] consists of a total of three chapters, and each chapter is progressed in a way that different narrators tell their own stories.
Players will encounter each story through simple mini-games and more.






After 3 chapters, one story related to the main character is completed.

On a rainy day, listen to the sound of rain and go into the memories that have been folded in your heart.
